text.section:
Upon sale of State bonds authorized by an enabling act, the principal amount of the loan authorized by that enabling act shall be reduced by:
the stated principal amount of the State bonds sold, if the bonds are sold at 95% or more of par; or
the cash proceeds, excluding any accrued interest, received for the State bonds, if the bonds are sold at less than 95% of par.

Whenever State bonds are sold as a consolidated issue at less than 95% of par, the Board, by resolution, shall determine the manner in which the cash proceeds received for the bonds, excluding accrued interest, shall be allocated among the loans included in that issue.
